test_hydro Module Reference

Testing the subroutine which provides the hydrodynamics of the tidal flow. More...

List of all members.

Public Member Functions

subroutine test_flow_continuity (ncell, nstep, start_time, total_time, domain_length, hydrodynamics, label)
 Generic test for checking mass continuity of fluid flow Checks dA/dt + dQ/dx = 0 in integral form over the input time interval The test will pass if the mid-time face flows (face flow should representing face average over time) equal the cell centered change in area*dx (cell area should represent storage integrated over the cell)
subroutine test_tidal_hydro
 Test the continuity of mass for water for tidal example flow todo: coordinate this with test_advection_tidal todo: a lot of this is redundant with the general continuity test.
subroutine test_zoppou_flow ()
 Tests mass continuity of fluid flow for the Zoppou test.

Detailed Description

Testing the subroutine which provides the hydrodynamics of the tidal flow.

Member Function/Subroutine Documentation

subroutine test_hydro::test_flow_continuity ( integer, intent(in)  ncell,
integer, intent(in)  nstep,
real(stm_real), intent(in)  start_time,
real(stm_real), intent(in)  total_time,
real(stm_real), intent(in)  domain_length,
procedure(hydro_data_if), intent(in), pointer  hydrodynamics,
character(LEN=*), intent(in)  label 
)

Generic test for checking mass continuity of fluid flow Checks dA/dt + dQ/dx = 0 in integral form over the input time interval The test will pass if the mid-time face flows (face flow should representing face average over time) equal the cell centered change in area*dx (cell area should represent storage integrated over the cell)

Parameters:
[in]ncelltodo: this must be coordinated with test_advection_tidal, better if it were automatic
[in]ncellNumber of cells
[in]nstepNumber of time
[in]total_timeTotal time
[in]start_timeStart time
[in]domain_lengthDomain_length
[in]labelLabel for test
[in]hydrodynamicsHydrodynamics interface to be tested
